full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGOD MA'I 'BRAS MCHOD MDO RTA PHYUGS GI BU YI BSANGS GA-YANG KHUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES SOGS PO YUL DU RGOD MA'I 'BRAS MCHOD ZHES BYAR GRAGS SHING STA MA MCHOD PA NI, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MIN, ,CHING  GIshA RGYAL PO RGYAL PHRAN BLON PO RNAMS RANG RANG GIS SA CHU MING GIS 'JUG CING RANG RAG GIS BSAM BZHIN BYA BA YIN, DE'I GO RIM LA SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD LHA KLU SA BDAG SOGS SNGON DU 'JUG PA NI TSUL MIN PA'I PHYIR, @007A *, ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD PHAN THOGS PA'I BSAM STE BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
